mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblCamera(CameraName, ImageURL, MACAddress, IPAddress, RTSPString, TypeDetect, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, StatusId) VALUE(#{cameraName}, #{imageURL}, #{macAddress}, #{ipAddress}, #{rtspString}, #{typeDetect}, convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{createdTime}), convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{createdTime}), #{statusId})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CameraId, C.CameraName, C.ImageURL, C.MACAddress, C.IPAddress, C.RTSPString, C.TypeDetect, C.UpdatedTime, C.CreatedTime, C.StatusId, STT.StatusName, C.ReasonInactive, STK.StackId, STK.Position, SH.ShelfId AS ShelfId, SH.ShelfName AS ShelfName, SPCM.AddedCameraTime, ST.StoreId, ST.StoreName, ST.ImageURL AS StoreImage FROM tblCamera C JOIN tblStatus STT ON C.StatusId = STT.StatusId LEFT JOIN tblStackProductCameraMapping SPCM ON SPCM.CameraId = C.CameraId AND SPCM.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblStack STK ON SPCM.StackId = STK.StackId AND STK.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblShelf SH ON STK.ShelfId = SH.ShelfId AND SH.StatusId != 2 JOIN tblStore ST ON SH.StoreId = ST.StoreId AND ST.StatusId != 2 AND ST.StoreId IS NOT NULL WHERE C.CameraId = #{cameraId} UNION ALL SELECT C.CameraId, C.CameraName, C.ImageURL, C.MACAddress, C.IPAddress, C.RTSPString, C.TypeDetect, C.UpdatedTime, C.CreatedTime, C.StatusId, STT.StatusName, C.ReasonInactive, '' AS StackId, '' AS Position, SH2.ShelfId, SH2.ShelfName, SCM.AddedTime, ST2.StoreId, ST2.StoreName, ST2.ImageURL AS StoreImage FROM tblCamera C JOIN tblStatus STT ON C.StatusId = STT.StatusId LEFT JOIN tblShelfCameraMapping SCM ON C.CameraId = SCM.CameraId AND SCM.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblShelf SH2 ON SCM.ShelfId = SH2.ShelfId AND SH2.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblStore ST2 ON ST2.StoreId = SH2.StoreId AND ST2.StatusId != 2 AND ST2.StoreId IS NOT NULL WHERE C.CameraId = #{cameraId} AND C.CameraId NOT IN ( SELECT C.CameraId FROM tblCamera C JOIN tblStatus STT ON C.StatusId = STT.StatusId LEFT JOIN tblStackProductCameraMapping SPCM ON SPCM.CameraId = C.CameraId AND SPCM.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblStack STK ON SPCM.StackId = STK.StackId AND STK.StatusId = 1 LEFT JOIN tblShelf SH ON STK.ShelfId = SH.ShelfId AND SH.StatusId != 2 JOIN tblStore ST ON SH.StoreId = ST.StoreId AND ST.StatusId != 2 AND ST.StoreId IS NOT NULL WHERE C.CameraId = #{cameraId} )

SELECT TS.StoreId FROM tblCamera TC LEFT JOIN tblShelfCameraMapping TSCM ON (TC.CameraId = TSCM.CameraId AND TSCM.StatusId = 1 ) LEFT JOIN tblShelf TS ON (TS.ShelfId = TSCM.ShelfId) WHERE TC.CameraId = #{cameraId}

SELECT TS.StoreId FROM tblCamera TC LEFT JOIN tblStackProductCameraMapping TSCM ON (TC.CameraId = TSCM.CameraId AND TSCM.StatusId = 1) LEFT JOIN tblStack TSS ON (TSS.StackId = TSCM.StackId) LEFT JOIN tblShelf TS ON (TS.ShelfId = TSS.ShelfId) WHERE TC.CameraId = #{cameraId}
